summary:
This mod contains new textures that replaces the fur in the bandit armor (known in 
game as \"Fur Armor\") with white \"yak\" fur.
descriptionHtml:
-------------
CONTENT
-------------

This mod contains new textures that replaces the fur in the bandit armor (known in 
game as \"Fur Armor\") with white \"yak\" fur.
[center]
***Will not work with High Resolution Texture Pack plugins enabled!***
But you can look here: [b] http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/555122-is-the-skyrim-high-resolution-texture-pack-worth-it/ [/b] for a work-around. [/center] 


-------------------
INSTALLATION
-------------------

Male and Female textures are included in separately marked files. You may choose to 
install one, or the other, or both. Simply place the \"texture\" folder(s), (found 
within the \"Male\" and \"Female\" folders provided), into your Skyrim/Data folder.

+++Version Update+++
White Bandit Fur 1.1

As of this version, Male White Bandit Fur\'s are also included!


--------------
UNINSTALL
--------------

Remove the following files from your Skyrim/Data/textures/clothes/bandit folder:

Female Files Only:
banditf 
bandithatf 
banditf_n 
bandithatf_n

Male Files Only:
banditm_n
banditm
bandithatm
bandithatm_n

To uninstall both male and female armor, you can remove your entire \"bandit\" folder or rename it to something else (like \"banditWBF\"), and the game will simply stop reading it.


--------------------------
TROUBLESHOOTING
---------------------------

Please contact me at <loudthoughts@gmail.com> if you have any problems or concerns. I have had texture files corrupt and change when moving them between computers, so please let me know if this happens to you!
author: e7seif
